import java.util.*;
public class Phase_One_Cities {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		String cityOne= sc.nextLine();
		String cityTwo= sc.nextLine();
		String cityThree= sc.nextLine();
		String cityFour= sc.nextLine();
		String cityFive= sc.nextLine();
		String citySix= sc.nextLine();
		
		
		System.out.print(cityOne);
		System.out.print(cityTwo);
		System.out.print(cityThree);
		System.out.print(cityFour);
		System.out.print(cityFive);
		System.out.print(citySix);
			
		}
		
		

	}
